reapack.desc: bfut_MIDI notes to empty items (explode note rows to subtracks)

version.author: bfut
version.changelog: + convert note multiples from looped items, obeying take playrate

version.author: bfut
version.changelog: + support time signature markers # Fix: no more side-effects due to arrange view zoom-level # 'note velocity to item volume' off by default

version.author: bfut
version.changelog: + avoid creating excessive items from lengths below range threshold

version.author: bfut
version.changelog: + Copy item note text to pasted items + Fix: item take colors in pasted items

version.author: bfut
version.changelog: + Copy item note text to pasted items + Fix: item take colors in pasted items + Fix: adjust pitch for all takes in 'note pitch as item pitch' flavor

version.author: bfut
version.changelog: + preserve more item properties, especially group ID

version.author: bfut
version.changelog: REQUIRES: Reaper v6.82 or later + performance improvements - no longer preserve free item position
